meanings.definition: Badly or wrongly started or begun.
meanings.sent1: The project was misbegun and faced many challenges from the start.
meanings.sent2: She misbegun attempted to fix the leaky faucet but only made it worse.
meanings.sent3: The magician misbegun tried to pull a rabbit out of the hat, but a duck appeared instead!
meanings.sent4: His misbegun journey through the forest led him deeper into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The misbegun plan quickly unraveled as soon as it was put into action.

meanings.definition: Having a bad or unfortunate beginning.
meanings.sent1: The misbegun relationship ended before it even had a chance to blossom.
meanings.sent2: The misbegun movie received poor reviews due to its weak opening scene.
meanings.sent3: The misbegun party was saved by a surprise visit from a famous singer.
meanings.sent4: Her misbegun career in acting took a turn for the better after landing a lead role.
meanings.sent5: The misbegun day turned into a series of fortunate events by the evening.
